original_title: Giizis Mooka’am: Giiwe (Sun/Moon Rise: She Goes Home)
overview: 16mm film project made as part of the Waabanishimo (She Dances Till Daylight) series. These films bend time and collapse the space between Los Angeles and Santa Fe, the ghost world and the world of the living.
title: Giizis Mooka’am: Giiwe (Sun/Moon Rise: She Goes Home)
